subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, the Tour de France champion, said he was set to join the Astana team. “I’ve spoken with Johan Bruyneel and, lacking only a few details, I’ll go with him to Astana,” Contador told the Spanish daily Marca. “Their offer convinced me.” Contador, a Spaniard, is set to follow Bruyneel from the disbanded Discovery Channel team. But a spokeswoman for Astana said the team “did not and won’t ask Alberto Contador to be a rider on the team next year.”.
